extension.description: Allows the user to trigger RF actions when different events occur in XBMC. The possible events are XBMC Starting, XBMC Quitting, Movie Playback Started, Movie Playback Ended, Movie Paused, Movie Resumed, Music Playback Started, Music Playback Ended, Music Paused, Music Resumed.
extension.disclaimer: This addon requires an RF transceiver installed on the device to send actions
